name: A A
text: Don't ever order online here; they don't keep their hours and if you order when they're closed (when they're supposed to be open), you will have no way to call them or contact them in any way except by email (who knows if they even …More

name: Rebecca Xia
text: Must try BBQ chicken. A nice fast food choice.

name: DJ Asdfjkl
text: The workers here are very rude and unprofessional. Upon walking up, they were all standing around talking and laughing with each other while it looked like only two of them were actually doing work. And some of them even had headphones in. …More

name: Mario Smith
text: Had a great experience from the 2 times I went. Was my first time trying blaze and employees were more than willing to help me through options. …More

name: Alex C
text: Do they actually run a business here? Doesn't seem like it. HQ should take away the franchise from this management.

name: Miles Mbo
text: I got to go to this place twice in 2 days. Unfortunately I wasn't serve food. The first reason was the machine is down. Ok. It happens. The second time, I met rude workers. I asked about the closing time (which is 9pm and I asked the day …More

name: David Bialeschki
text: When blaze first opened it was okay and then it kind of went downhill and took forever to get a pizza and it didn't taste right but lately it's been rocking and The taste is great and I accidentally found that out cuz I quit going to blaze …More

name: Dave Vesely
text: Spoiled food? Or food not held at right temp? Not sure what, but me and my friend each ordered a pizza. Shortly after eating we both had to RUN to the bathroom. Hours later, still visiting the throne. I'm sure we weren't the only ones. …More

name: Patrick Mason
text: The pizza was pricey, and it made me very ill after I finished it.

name: Chris Napier
text: Hours are not correct, went to get food and they were closed.

name: Michael Castillo
text: Employees were extremely rude, had zero patience and were constantly swearing. Very unprofessional and very disappointing. To top it off, the two pizzas I bought were both burnt.
